subject: Testing a class with private constructor
msgSnippet: I have a class with a private constructor and a static factory method that returns an instance.  I would like to run a Junit test that tests a few methods of
messageBody:
I have a class with a private constructor and a static factory method
that returns an instance. I would like to run a Junit test that tests
a few methods of this class but I do not want to make the constructor
public and I would rather avoid creating a mock object to pass to the
static factory because this could take some time to develop. What is
the best way to handle this?
